Posts.Content:
Hey everyone! My name is Margo Rey, and I'm currently on my second of four rounds of chemo treatments. I made this video:http://bit.ly/19pvFgb in the hopes of giving back some inspiration to those who've inspired me.
I'm also a musician and am sharing my journey with all of my fans. I'd really appreciate it if you took a few seconds to check out my music right here:
Â soundcloud.com/margorey
I'm hope someday to be a source of inspiration and motivation. Embrace the mohawk ladies!!
Posts.Title: Spreading the inspiration
